attributes.contentHtml: Note to Bad: Just give up. You're making a mockery of yourself and are an embarrassment. Stop blaming your staff, YOU are the problem here, and have always been the problem. Why? You leech off of them, basically surviving because of them. You are an incompetent fucktard, an absolute fucking embarrassment. This would be all over if you took the time to learn from your mistakes, improve upon yourself, your reputation, instead of leeching off of more knowledgeable people. The amount of times you've had datalosses and got raided without realizing it was because of your pure incompetency having to leech off of other people instead of managing your own host, is insane. Just stop

attributes.bio:
Papi Jedrik — 07/29/2021
I can't handle this community anymore, it was fun at the start with winterhoax, i'll save you the hassle, i'm resigning

Sloth — 07/29/2021
my thoughts exactly
